documents.document: @Kodaline 2 days after my birthday. Oh yeah. Can’t wait to see yiz tomorrow at @MalahideCastleG
RT @Kodaline: How’s your Thursday going? Because basically we’re just gonna go ahead and tell you OUR NEW ALBUM IS CALLED THE POLITICS OF L…
@Kodaline Can anybody that’s coming on here to complain just not. Thanks.
@Kodaline Yay!!
@useyourmind @Kodaline I know! It’s disappointing but they’ll still be amazing. 👍🏻
@useyourmind @Kodaline Fingers crossed it’s July 1st.
@Kodaline @mcd_productions @MalahideCastleG Hi, any stage times for Friday please? #babysittingissues
@Kodaline @VinnyKodaline @markkodaline @SteveKodaline Malahide Castle is a gorgeous place. Can’t wait. It’s been too long since I’ve seen you guys at a gig.
RT @eoghanmcdermo: HERE IT IS! The new single from #CEOL2018.... @Kodaline with "Follow Your Fire" as Gaeilge.. It's amazing, so much love!…
@celtus I’m so sorry to read your tweet. I sent you a DM.
@louisemcsharry Even better that she’s playing @olympiatheatre I love that place for gigs.

@SteveKodaline @JayKodaline @Etaoin The sunset was amazing this evening. I couldn’t get a good pic tho.
@ShawnMendes @BBCTheOneShow @BBC1 Saw you. My daughter & I may have rewatched it once or twice. Had to laugh when they tried to get you to eat crisps that were 4 years out of date. You’re so polite.
@KeithWalsh2fm Ha ha the ickle fella. Sabrina’s a lucky woman - @campaignforleo is looking quite dreamy in that pic. #polaropposites Can’t wait for the memes.
Great pic. #totalopposites https://t.co/D16EQvGcDG

You are literally scarring your skin!!

@Independent_ie @markkodaline Idiot Trump of course thinks the Republic of Ireland is in the UK 🙄 so he deserves to be made fun of. I’m not remotely surprised that he thought that though...

@useyourmind Sorry you’re so sad.
@ShawnMendesFans @ShawnMendes I’m the 8th of the 8th too. But waaaaaaay older then you or Shawn. 🤭
I’m getting a really strong smell of cigarette smoke in the apartment. Nobody here is smoking. Weird....
@useyourmind Oh sad.

@mackenziestith I’d say @spencerpratt has made so many people like her music. And Enya’s music too. Whenever he plays her music (every time he has a breakfast burrito mainly ☺️) I’m even more proud to be Irish.

I’ve got a habit of falling asleep with my phone or iPad in my hand & pressing things. I’ve rang people & I’ve sent people videos of my ceiling. I sent about 10 ppl requests to chat on Facebook messenger I think last night. I couldn’t figure out why random ppl were accepting. 🙄

@Kodaline Seriously considering the Barcelona show but hoping an Irish date will be announced. I always need a @Kodaline gig to look forward to. I’m just greedy like that. #PoliticsOfLivingTour

https://t.co/B8LDDvOp07 I know I’m always talking about them but have a look at this video. So many emotions will explode in your brain, I can’t explain it. Steve’s voice just gets better all the time as do their songs. Ok I’ll shut up now.. @Kodaline @SteveKodaline #ShedATear
The gig my sister & me went to. Excellent of course. Their gigs always are. #ShedaTear #kodaline #PoliticsOfLiving https://t.co/8dmnFhY0by
@Kodaline It’s great. I love how excited you were to be having flames & confetti canons etc. they looked amazing.
@oneilllo @louisemcsharry Horrific. The desperation they must’ve felt to risk their lives.
@marygreenwell1 @RosemaryMacCabe You’re both ridiculously fit!
@Saryously @spencerpratt I bought it too! Knew lots of the songs already of course. ☺️
@Saryously @spencerpratt I often wonder if sales of her songs & albums increased thanks to him. 🤔 Though in fairness she does pretty well. She’s the best selling solo artist here in Ireland.

@ShawnMendes It’s my birthday too but I’m MUCH older then you. 🙀 Have a great time celebrating your birthday with your pals. 😊

Dusty biting Zeppelin on the bum. It was great seeing Dusty today. When Dad died my sister, brother & me each took one of his 3 cats. It hasn’t been easy for the cats we already had but… https://t.co/3PdFwK6wMu
@DonnaIRL True.

Wow. My Dad would’ve been fascinated with that. https://t.co/O26VFWNo1C

@LaFranglaise66 @DonnaIRL Yes I agree. Very sorry that this has happened to you Donna. It’s a crap situation.

@moby_dickhead As we’d say here in Ireland- Jaysis! Some people have way too much time on their hands.

@Kodaline Head held high is now on my Politics of Living album. I don’t think it was there before. I’d only seen it recorded live by @KodalineFanBase . Love it. Was surprised there was no announcement. Saw you saying it was an accident?
@useyourmind @Kodaline @KodaSamm Yes I got an email telling me Head held high was available & I’m in Dublin.

@VinnyKodaline @VodafoneIreland Raging I missed the Comedy Festival again. Would’ve especially liked to have seen @Aoife_Dooley . #vodafonecomedyfestival

It’s so good to be home after a month away. 🇮🇪 The holiday was great but you can’t beat home. We’re really looking forward to seeing our cats who are going to look very fat compared to skinny Spanish cats. 🐱
@Si73ead Jaysis!
Totally agree with @olympiatheatre being a very special place. https://t.co/eds7VNr1Jy
@lynnannem I always go to & still have awful teeth & always need lots of things done. Maybe we shouldn’t bother going?!
@carinaelliott15 @VinnyKodaline Ha ha, if only men went through what women have to go through!
@VinnyKodaline It’s feckin so sore having your teeth cleaned. I genuinely prefer getting a filling.
@flynnfluencer @SharonLeavy1 Perhaps the person who took the pic wasn’t looking at the tree 👀☺️

@SharonLeavy1 In most pools where kids do lessons etc. photography is banned. What bugged me a lot was that I dislike that https://t.co/diCEBgVTN5 app & don’t let my daughter on it. Their parents obviously don’t mind their kids on it in swimming togs though. 🤷🏼‍♀️

@SharonLeavy1 We’re away & went for a swim in the shared pool. When we got there, teens filming another girl jumping into the pool for https://t.co/diCEBgVTN5. I was the bad guy for telling them to put the phone away. It was for my daughter, I don’t want her filmed in background.
